info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 05 at 8:24PM CST until March 05 at 9:15PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CST FOR SOUTHWESTERN ROCK ISLAND...WESTERN MERCER...LOUISA AND SOUTHEASTERN MUSCATINE COUNTIES... At 824 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Muscatine to near Wapello, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Illinois City, Fairport, Eliza and Mannon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CST for northwestern and west central Illinois...and southeastern and east central Iowa. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building.
